mapper.insert: insert into paymentscheduledetail (bidAmount, bidId, paymentScheduleId, borrowUser_id, investorId, bidRequestId, returnType, payDate, deadLine, monthIndex, totalAmount, principal, interest) values (#{bidAmount}, #{bidId}, #{paymentScheduleId}, #{borrowUser.id}, #{investorId}, #{bidRequestId}, #{returnType}, #{payDate}, #{deadLine}, #{monthIndex}, #{totalAmount}, #{principal}, #{interest})
mapper.update: update paymentscheduledetail set bidAmount = #{bidAmount}, bidId = #{bidId}, paymentScheduleId = #{paymentScheduleId}, borrowUser_id = #{borrowUser.id}, investorId = #{investorId}, bidRequestId = #{bidRequestId}, returnType = #{returnType}, payDate = #{payDate}, deadLine = #{deadLine}, monthIndex = #{monthIndex}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount}, principal = #{principal}, interest = #{interest} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: p.id, p.bidAmount, p.bidId, p.paymentScheduleId, p.investorId, p.bidRequestId, p.returnType, p.payDate, p.deadLine, p.monthIndex, p.totalAmount, p.principal, p.interest, bu.id as bu_id, bu.username as bu_username
mapper.select: select from paymentscheduledetail p join logininfo bu on p.borrowUser_id = bu.id
